price: 50 Nos ordres, exécutés en un clin d’œil, se limitent à une seule parole.
arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil-baṣari
